text: You doubled the price! Such price gouging! :scream:

elements.text: You doubled the price! Such price gouging!

text: hey the market has increased in demand and I have limited stock. 2 new employees got stuck in VIM without their device installed while prototyping. these costs add up

text: Oh! I have a Nano (I bought it while I was at the 2019 JuliaCon in Baltimore), to play around with GPU programming, but haven’t had time lately.
